import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set a single translation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/i18n/languages/{language}/translations/ns/{namespace}/keys/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates or updates a custom translation for the specified language, namespace, and key.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"language","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Language tag in BCP 47 format (e.g., `en`, `es`, `fr-CA`).","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?(-[A-Za-z]+)?$","example":"es"}},{"name":"namespace","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Namespace for grouping translations (e.g., `auth`, `errors`, `common`).","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$","minLength":1,"maxLength":64,"example":"errors"}},{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Translation key within the namespace (e.g., `login.button`, `user.not_found`).","schema":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+$","minLength":1,"maxLength":256,"example":"user.not_found"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to set a single translation.","required":["value"],"properties":{"value":{"type":"string","description":"Translation value.","minLength":1,"maxLength":4096,"example":"Usuario no encontrado"}},"title":"SetTranslationRequest"},"example":{"value":"Usuario no encontrado"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Translation set successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Single translation tag.","example":"es"},"namespace":{"type":"string","description":"Namespace of the translation.","example":"errors"},"key":{"type":"string","description":"Translation key.","example":"user.not_found"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Translated value.","example":"Usuario no encontrado"}},"title":"TranslationResponse"},"example":{"language":"es","namespace":"errors","key":"user.not_found","value":"Usuario no encontrado"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - Invalid
